title: Design Thinking and Eye-Tracking Technology Utilization Strategies for Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Learners aim to improve job-related mathematical application skills in an environment enabling real-time data collection via personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can design various types of mathematics tasks related to fraction concepts by applying the design thinking process
Can explain methods to analyze learners' cognitive patterns and evaluate task effectiveness using eye-tracking technology
When developing differentiated mathematics learning materials, a quantitative data collection system can be designed for learner needs analysis.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
